name: Lucid9
description:
Lucid9 is a noncommercial, mystery visual novel created by Fallen Snow Studios, an international team of volunteers formed in 2014. The project is available free of charge under the Creative Commons BY-NC-ND License, and is published by Sekai Project on Steam.

Lucid9: Inciting Incident can be considered the common route of the visual novel, with a continuation including five routes slated to be released in the future.
